title: [Unturned 3.14.0.0] 更新记录
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
Steam 连接 : http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
Unturned Forum 连接 : http://unturned-forum.com/threads/3-14-0-0-update-notes.4683/

Additions/添加: 
Added multiplayer-only Arena game mode.多人游戏加入Arena(竞技场)游戏模式.Added Monolith Arena map.加入Monolith Arena(竞技场) 地图.Added Alpha Valley Arena map.加入 Alpha Valley Arena(竞技场) 地图.Added basic obstruction check to ray inputs. [Patched some exploits.]加入射线输入检查.[修复一些漏洞].Added browse workshop content button.加入预览workshop（创意工坊）内容按钮.Added note #13.加入注释 #13.Added high-res item icon .pngs to the Extras/Icons folder.加入高分辨率物品图标 .pngs格式在Extras/Icons文件夹内.

Improvements/优化: 
Improved sphere volume display in editor.优化编辑器界面球体体积显示.

Tweaks/调整: 
Tweaked debug info available.调整debug信息.Tweaked reject message for plugin use.调整拒绝使用插件提示.Tweaked player spawns to be more useful for mods.调整玩家生成点为了优化mod的兼容性.Tweaked hiking/roadtrip achievement requirements.调整 hiking/roadtrip 成就所需条件.Tweaked leave timer to not apply with 1 player or in safezone.调整退出时间倒计时在安全区域内或不对一个玩家生效.

Fixes/修复: 
Fixed placing buildables inside player.修复可在玩家(模型)内摆放物品Fixed tutorial messages with hints disabled.修复教程模式不显示提示.Fixed target framerate on dedicated server.修复专用服务器目标帧速率.Fixed crash when run over by empty vehicle on server.修复空车(无人)崩溃服务器.Fixed barricade interact range verification.修复路障互动范围检测.Fixed vehicle spawn ID error.修复车辆生成ID错误/修复召唤车辆ID错误 （因为不知道是自然生成还是指令召唤）.

如有错误，还望指出。
